comments.body: ### :x: Validation status: errors File | Status | Preview URL | Details ---- | ------ | ----------- | ------- []() | :x:Error | | [Details](#user-content-) ### []() - **[Error]** File:../externals/skia not existed. - **[Error]** Some error ocurred while parsing changelist file: W:\twms-log-bd7b7c0f\change-list-with-redirection.mapped.tsv. For more details, please refer to the [build report](https://opbuildstorageprod.blob.core.windows.net/report/2018%5C7%5C26%5C81ca5486-8c50-0a94-05c4-486e23e99ecf%5CPullRequest%5C201807261601366870-593%5Cworkflow_report.html?sv=2015-02-21&sr=b&sig=Kg4YthqmLevpbRm%2FO1nfDxmUlUquR%2BSkWWe%2FUIwqeAo%3D&st=2018-07-26T15%3A58%3A22Z&se=2018-08-26T16%3A03%3A22Z&sp=r). **Note:** If you changed an existing file name or deleted a file, broken links in other files to the deleted or renamed file are listed only in the full build report.
